string.value: #b#p2041023##k said to open the door in #m220060400#, I'll need #b#t4031##k. However, he says he lost the key while being chased by #r#o8160000##k....\r\n#i4031496##t4031496# #b#c4031496#/1

Magician #b#p2041023##k's performance will continue as long as #m220000000#;s clock works! ...you're not here to see #b#p2041023##k's magic. What are you looking for? \r\n#L0# I'm looking for #b#o9300086#.#l
Are you looking for #b#o9300086##k? Why do you need him? I can't let you in because he's dangerous. \r\n#b#L0# I'm studying element-based magic with #p2020005#.#l

Studying element-based magic with #b#p2020005##k? If the best magician say that, it'll be true. I certainly see #r#o9300086##k in #b#m922020100##k. I have the key. Oh Gosh! I lost it when I was chased by #b#o8160000##k. \r\n#b#L0#I'll get it for you#l
Really? If you're strong enough to kill #r#o8160000##k, do so and get me #b#t4031473##k please. Then I'll let you in to #b#o9300086##k's room in the different dimension of #b#m220060400##k.
You don't want to? Without #t4031473#, you can't see him...
Ah! You gathered #b#t4031473##k! Fabulous~ I almost lost track of time!
I'll let you in any room you like. #b#m922020100##k is very dangerous. Make a party with two other Arch Mages to go in. Talk to me when you ready.
